Your Monthly Insights From Justia Connect Pro

Community Tips

Take Advantage of CLE Courses

Take advantage of professional development courses with your Justia Connect membership! Our free Justia Webinars are open to all members and explore a broad array of topics, including law practice management, legal marketing, substantive legal developments, professional ethics, and more. Please note that while all Justia Connect members are invited to attend Justia Webinars, only Justia Connect Pros are eligible to earn CLE credit.
Browse Available Webinars

Justia Webinars

Upcoming Presentations
Virtual Isolation: Is Hyperconnectivity Helping or Harming the Legal Professional?

Recent studies have shown that there has been a dramatic increase in impairment due to alcoholism, addiction, and mental health disorders among members of the legal profession. What role does an always-connected society and technology play in this phenomenon? Explore this question in our upcoming webinar led by Brian S. Quinn of Lawyers Concerned for Lawyers of Pennsylvania. Please note this webinar is approved for one hour of California Competence Issues MCLE credit.

Register Now

As we begin what promises to be another eventful U.S. Supreme Court Term, Justia Webinars is proud to present our 2023-2024 Supreme Court Term preview! Please note the on-demand version of this program is approved for one hour of General MCLE credit in California.

Professionalism in the Age of Social Media: Relevance, Reliability, and Referability on LinkedIn

Want to get insights that may just be the catalyst for change in your practice? LinkedIn offers a great tool for lawyers seeking new contacts and professional recognition. We invite you to watch this on-demand webinar in which attorney Andy Brownstein and LinkedIn trainer and consultant Marc W. Halpert share their tips and tricks for maximizing LinkedIn for success.
